news.title: Public warned of difficult travelling conditions as country braces for threat of ‘significant’ flooding
‘Cristiano Ronaldo should be ashamed’ – The view from Lisbon as Portugal come under fire following Ireland’s World Cup win
news.summary: The media in Portugal have not held back in their criticism as they assessed Roberto Martinez and his side after their 2-0 defeat to Ireland in the World Cup qualifiers.

news.title: Michael Flatley must pay €1.1m upfront for legal costs ahead of €30m action over Cork mansion works
news.summary: Lord of the Dance star Michael Flatley has been ordered by a judge to pay €1.1million upfront as security for costs in advance of his €30million court action over works carried out at his Cork mansion.

news.title: ‘Children sometimes have nightmares about monsters. I had a real-life monster’ – woman tells of devastating abuse by ‘pillar of the community’ Pat Salmon
news.summary: A woman who was abused by a “pillar of the community” as a five-year-old child has said that while young children sometimes have nightmares about monsters, “I had a real monster”.

news.title: Carer who ‘bled dry’ nursing home resident after stealing €82,000 from his bank accounts avoids jail
news.summary: An elderly resident of a nursing home was “practically bled dry” by a woman entrusted with his care who stole over €82,000 from his bank accounts, a court has heard.

news.title: Ireland v Australia predictions: Our rugby experts give their verdict on the big match
news.summary: Ireland are a better team than Australia and if they can solve their set-piece problems and impose themselves physically, they should come out on top of a tight affair. Joe Schmidt will have the Wallabies ready, but an Ireland statement is long overdue.

news.title: Ireland into U17 World Cup round of 16 as nerves hold against Canada in penalty shoot-out drama
news.summary: Ireland have booked their place in the last 16 of the Under-17 World Cup thanks to the two Noonans.

news.title: Karen Tumulty: Trump on edge as MAGA refuses to turn a blind eye to Epstein scandal
news.summary: The “Make America Great Again” base has had no trouble looking the other way when it comes to Donald Trump’s trampling of norms and ethical standards: the coarseness; the indictments; the retribution against his enemies; the self-enrichment while in office; the unprecedented claims of executive power.

news.title: Irish rock band pay tribute to Wexford woman who passed away in the Dominican Republic – ‘She lived life to the fullest’
news.summary: Irish rock band paid tribute to Wexford mother, Claire Cullen, following her death highlighting her musical talents.

news.title: ‘I found an ex-display bargain on DoneDeal, priced to sell quickly’ – 12 expert tips and tricks to find an affordable, well-made sofa
news.summary: Choosing the right sofa is one of the most important purchases you’re likely to make for your home. It’s a major investment, and a piece of furniture you’ll want to ensure can withstand years of binge-watching, snacking, entertaining and lazing about.
